@MobilePunch Covid-19 & School Reopening: Use N27B meant 4 NASS to build 2 decent standard hostels (Male & Female) in d unity colleges nationwide. Some of diz schools' hostel are nothing 2 write home about. The hostels in these schools are inabitable 4 chickens. 
@NGRPresident @NigEducation
